overview: Codex is inspired by the Codex Serafinianus, an unusual scientific encyclopedia with strange drawings, written in an untranslatable language, fascinating grimoire that invents the laws of a delusional world ... Hence the mutant beings, microbes and imaginary silhouettes of the spectacle of Philippe Decoufl√©. The images bounce back and forth, populated by fantastic animals, imaginary plants and "live vegetables". It is a hallucinatory journey where palmated men rub shoulders with protean microbes.
title: Codex
